pre_caption: This is a low-angle, upward-looking shot of tall, leafy trees against a clear, bright blue sky. The leaves are a yellowish-green, and the trees frame the sky from all sides. The camera appears to be moving forward, creating a dynamic perspective as the trees pass by.
